messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Hello yall  this is your captain speaking. sorry for last weeks head of security trouble. nanotransen has offically dealt with the issue and i am almost certain it will never happen again. the chef is going to be cooking a nice meatball pie for us all later. and we then will have a bookclub meeting in the library at 10:30

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Research Initiatives

Cargo: Your station has been chosen for an epidemiological research project. Send us your cargo shuttle to receive your research samples.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Incinerator.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All vulpkanians, unathis and tajarans are considered to be a lower tier from any other non-human specie, therefore don't treat them with respect. Any crimes agaisn't have haver lighter punishments, per example if you punch a cat, instead of getting 15 minutes arrested it's 5.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Ian was pubically executed on the bridge

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Base Construction.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Dab on em haters, benjamin gladlow coolest boy this side of the station, nut boys ride or die

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Olivia Kiefer was been proven to be an traitor, if she is spotted, alert us, security team, so we can detain her.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are evacuating the station, it's just pure KoS
